name: Classic Ribeye Steak
description: A juicy ribeye steak seasoned with salt, pepper, and a hint of garlic.

name: New York Steak
description: Tender New York strip steak with a rich, beefy flavor, grilled to perfection.

name: Filet Mignon
description: Succulent filet mignon, known for its tenderness and delicate texture.

name: T-Bone Steak
description: A classic T-bone steak combining the rich taste of a strip with the tenderness of a filet.

name: Sirloin Steak
description: Lean and flavorful sirloin steak, best served medium-rare.

name: Porterhouse Steak
description: A larger version of the T-bone, with more of the tender filet.

name: Tomahawk Steak
description: A long-bone ribeye steak, rich in flavor and perfect for grilling.

name: Beef Wellington
description: A savory preparation of tenderloin encased in puff pastry with mushroom duxelles.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with creamy Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.

name: Bruschetta
description: Toasted bread topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, garlic, and olive oil.

name: Garlic Bread
description: Crispy bread with buttery garlic spread.

name: Chicken Wings
description: Crispy chicken wings with a choice of sauces.

name: Cheese Platter
description: An assortment of fine cheeses served with crackers.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled with lemon and herbs.

name: Lamb Chops
description: Tender lamb chops with a rosemary and garlic marinade.

name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
description: Creamy Alfredo sauce over fettuccine with grilled chicken.

name: Lobster Risotto
description: Creamy risotto with succulent pieces of lobster.

name: Seafood Paella
description: Traditional Spanish rice dish with a variety of seafood.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey center, served with vanilla ice cream.

name: Tiramisu
description: Coffee-flavored Italian dessert with layers of ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

name: Cheesecake
description: Creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust, topped with fresh berries.

name: Apple Pie
description: Traditional apple pie with a flaky crust, served warm.

name: Mini Cheeseburgers
description: Kid-sized burgers with cheese on a small bun.

name: Chicken Tenders
description: Crispy chicken tenders served with dipping sauces.

name: Fish & Chips
description: Golden-battered fish paired with classic, thick-cut fries, served with tartar sauce.

name: Milk Stout
description: Rich and creamy with notes of chocolate and coffee, complemented by a smooth, sweet finish.

name: Hoppy IPA
description: A bold, hoppy IPA with citrus and pine aromas, offering a crisp and refreshing bitterness.

name: Amber Ale
description: Smooth and malty with a balanced caramel sweetness and a hint of roasted flavor.

name: Sour Cherry Ale
description: Tart and fruity, this ale offers a vibrant cherry flavor with a pleasantly sour finish.

name: Dark Porter
description: Rich in dark chocolate and roasted coffee notes, this porter is both robust and smooth.

name: Golden Lager
description: Bright and clean with a golden hue, offering a smooth, balanced malt flavor.

name: Crisp Pilsner
description: A classic Pilsner with a refreshing, crisp profile, balanced by light hop bitterness.
